com.hp.autonomy.aci.content.identifier

Interface QueryIdentifiers

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IndexingIdentifiers
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DocumentIdentifiers, Ids, References, StateIds
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractIds, AbstractReferences, AbstractStateIds, Databases, Id, IdsBuilder, Reference, ReferencesBuilder, StateId, StateIdsBuilder

    public interface QueryIdentifiers
extends IndexingIdentifiers
    QueryIdentifiers are document identifiers that can be used to filter a query action using a 'match' parameter, such as matchreference or statematchid. e.g.: 
        QueryIdentifiers identifiers = ...;

    AciParameters parameters = new AciParameters("query");
    parameters.add("text", "*");
    parameters.add(identifiers.getMatchParameterName(), identifiers);

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getMatchParameterName()
      The name of the 'match' parameter to use for this set of identifiers, such as matchreference.
      String toString()
      The string representation of this identifier, suitable for use as the value of a 'match' parameter on a query action.
